title: Journey To Healing - RVN Television
description: Holistic Psychologist Tatjana Obradovic takes us on an experiential tour around the world where we meet with spiritual healers, integrative medicine doctors and gurus who share with us their most valuable secrets and teach us how to reconnect with nature, activate our inner healer and become successful self-healers. The show is designed to guide viewers to awaken their best selves and realize that each one of us is a powerful self-healer, once we allow the energy of love to be our governing force.
